metadata.name: Added Owner To Application
metadata.comment: Detects when a new owner is added to an application. This gives that account privileges to make modifications and configuration changes to the application.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('add owner to application'))

output.summary: Detects when a new owner is added to an application. This gives that account privileges to make modifications and configuration changes to the application.

metadata.objective: False positive: When a new application owner is added by an administrator Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-applications#new-owner
